abstract: England soccer striker Wayne Rooney is barred for three matches by EUFA for red card against Montenegro, ruling him out of group stage of Euro 2012 championship; other soccer items noted.
snippet: The England striker Wayne Rooney was barred for three matches by UEFA for his red card against Montenegro, ruling him out of the group stage of Euro 2012.
lead_paragraph: The England striker Wayne Rooney was barred for three matches by UEFA for his red card against Montenegro, ruling him out of the group stage of Euro 2012.
